Interface IOfficerService

All Superinterfaces:
IApplicantService
All Known Implementing Classes:
OfficerService
public interface IOfficerService extends IApplicantService
Interface for services related to an HDB Officer. Extends IApplicantService, adding functionalities for project registration, booking applications, and handling enquiries on behalf of a project.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getProjectHandling

      Project getProjectHandling()
      Retrieves the project currently being handled by the officer.
      Returns:
      the Project object the officer is assigned to

    • getProjectsForRegi

      List<Project> getProjectsForRegi()
      Retrieves a list of projects available for officer registration.
      Returns:
      a list of available Project objects

    • submitRegistration

      void submitRegistration(String projectName)
      Submits a registration request for the officer to handle the specified project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project to register for

    • getRegistrations

      List<Registration> getRegistrations()
      Retrieves the list of project registration submissions by the officer.
      Returns:
      a list of Registration objects submitted by the officer

    • bookApplication

      void bookApplication(String applicantNric, Project project)
      Books a flat for the specified applicant under the given project.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - the NRIC of the applicant
      project - the project where the flat is to be booked

    • getEnquiriesForReply

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesForReply()
      Retrieves enquiries related to the officer's assigned project that require replies.
      Returns:
      a list of Enquiry objects awaiting responses

    • replyEnquiry

      void replyEnquiry(int id, String reply)
      Sends a reply to a specific enquiry.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the enquiry
      reply - the reply message content
